ovdesc.p: This application can be setup when agent or place of settlement is not setup as a customer record in T24 and particularly there is no BIC address for agent or place. This file will hold the print address of either agent or place of settlement. The id of the record in this application can be any free format text.

desc.p: This field will hold the print address of agent or place and can be multivalued to maximum 4.
